poem:
**On the Screen, A Brave New Cast**

In vibrant pixels, patience graces the screen,  
an eloquent puzzle of minds unfolding,  
each actor, a beacon of authenticity,  
weaving stories from their own unpolished lives.  
In a world of scripted echoes, these voices,  
ring true—a chorus of silent triumph,  
where difference finds its place,  
at long last, in the daylight of view.
